(Woohoo!  I've gotten post number 40038!

I have the Toad Borg action figure, he is most definately greater than 
Complex or anyone else)

Shockwave/Unitron:



Shockwave boosted his speed, out running all but a single shot, which blew a 
part of his middle fin off in the back of his space fighter form.  He didn't 
curse, he didn't yell in pain.  He simply got a target lock and fired two 
missiles, one at Forrior and the other at Cledar.

---

Unitron was struck by all the shots, the lasers not really doing anything 
while the two missiles put large dents in his turret.

Aft, Unitron thought.  I have to keep moving or I won't last.

The Decepticon powered up his motor and began going 30 MPH and climbing, but 
wouldn't be able to go to his maximum of 60 MPH because of the missile 
attacks.  His turret swerved slowly, firing off two blasts of large lasers at 
Hot Rod (he's a tank, no longer a space fighter).  His mounted machine gun on 
his turret turned just as fast as it ever did, firing off ten rapid laser 
bolts, all at Aerotaur.
